name: degenerate
content:
Add to word list

to become worse in quality: Educational standards are degenerating year by year because of a lack of funds. What was intended as a peaceful demonstration rapidly degenerated into violence. Synonym
deteriorate

to become worse: Standards of courtesy have degenerated since I was a girl.
bad or worse in quality or character, or (of a person) morally bad: He was a lazy, degenerate young man.
